name: Ilyushin IL-2 Shturmovik. Combat Flight Simulator
name_original: Ilyushin IL-2 Shturmovik. Combat Flight Simulator
description:
***** WINNER OF OVER 20 ARCADE GAME OF THE YEAR AWARDS *****
***** iPad Game of April 2014!!! ***** Editors Choice Best iOS Apps Magazine
* ...the gameplay is so immersive and engaging that destroying a target can feel like winning the battle, but really it’s just the beginning… (5 / 5) Best iOS Apps Magazine*

REACHED
*The No. 1 in Games - Simulation Category in the United Kingdom, Italy and Russia
* Top 10# in Games - Simulation Category in the United States, France, Japan, China, Canada, Germany and Finland
* Top 100# in Games - Simulation Category in 78 countries!!!
----------------------------------------------

3D Games presents " Ilyushin IL-2 Shturmovik - Combat Flight Simulator " game about the most famous ground-attack aircraft in the Second World War, produced by the Soviet Union in very large numbers. The Il-2 aircraft played a crucial role on the Eastern Front and they were "as essential to the Red Army as air and bread".

" Ilyushin IL-2 Shturmovik " is powered by Unreal Engine technology. By using Epic Games' award-winning, most advanced game engine, our Combat Flight Simulator brings in the game such incredible detailed graphics, real-time lighting with a unique physics and weapon system that has not been here yet. You will not believe it's only a game for mobile devices!

FORGET EVERYTHING ELSE! THIS IS THE ULTIMATE WWII AIR-TO-GROUND COMBAT GAME!
With an extensive single player missions and the non-stop action will keep you at the edge of your seat! You’ll participate in fierce attacks on protected convoys of enemy's vehicles, tanks, bridges and even airfields. Everything is set up in accurately recreated locations, similar to Eastern Front conditions.

Become the supreme lord of the skies!

CONSOLE QUALITY GAMING AND IT’S ONLY ON iOS!
Unparalleled visuals, special effects and audio including: specular masks, normal mapping, bump mapping, atmospheric scattering, realistic lighting, sun glare, high
definition textures, 4x anisotropic filtering, HDR rendering, radial blur and more!

OPTIMIZED ON THE NEW iPAD AIR AND iPHONE 5S
Optimized for iPhone 5S and iPad Air with the new A7 processors with greater environmental detail, spectacular visual effects and unparalleled performance!


RESTRICTIONS
Due to the high quality graphics and demanding real-time physics calculations this game is not recommended for older devices including the iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 1 and iPad 1
